core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Yî indicates that (in the state which it denotes) there will be advantage in every movement which shall be undertaken, that it will be advantageous (even) to cross the great stream.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Increase. Favor flows downward from those in power to those in need, and that shared abundance creates momentum. This is a moment to act boldly for the common good, not to hoard. Give sincerely, receive humbly, correct what’s wrong, and move fast on worthy action. Done properly, this attracts allies, trust, and mandate. Done selfishly, it isolates you and invites attack.

translations.text: The first NINE, undivided, shows that it will be advantageous for its subject in his position to make a great movement. If it be greatly fortunate, no blame will be imputed to him.
初九：利用為大作，元吉，無咎。

lines.normalized_meaning: You’re authorized to act big. Take initiative and move decisively while fortune is with you. Bold, well-timed effort brings blessing, not blame.

translations.text: The second SIX, divided, shows parties adding to the stores of its subject ten pairs of tortoise shells whose oracles cannot be opposed. Let him persevere in being firm and correct, and there will be good fortune. Let the king, (having the virtues thus distinguished), employ them in presenting his offerings to God, and there will be good fortune.
六二：或益之，十朋之龜弗克違，永貞吉。王用享于帝，吉。

lines.normalized_meaning: Support pours in from others — valuable, legitimizing support. Stay upright and dedicate that gain to rightful service, not personal luxury, and it becomes deeply auspicious.

translations.text: The third SIX, divided, shows increase given to its subject by means of what is evil, so that he shall (be led to good), and be without blame. Let him be sincere and pursue the path of the Mean, (so shall he secure the recognition of the ruler, like) an officer who announces himself to his prince by the symbol of his rank.
六三：益之用凶事，無咎。有孚中行，告公用圭。

lines.normalized_meaning: Increase comes through crisis or trouble. Handle that gain with sincerity and balance, not opportunism, and you’ll be received honorably by those in power.

translations.text: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject pursuing the due course. His advice to his prince is followed. He can with advantage be relied on in such a movement as that of removing the capital.
六四：中行，告公從。利用為依遷國。

lines.normalized_meaning: You counsel correctly and leaders actually listen. You’re now trusted with major structural change — even relocation of the center of power. This is high-responsibility influence.

translations.text: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject with sincere heart seeking to benefit (all below). There need be no question about it; the result will be great good fortune. (All below) will with sincere heart acknowledge his goodness.
九五：有孚惠心，勿問元吉。有孚惠我德。

lines.normalized_meaning: The ruler honestly wants to help everyone, and everyone knows it. True generosity from the center creates unanimous goodwill and great fortune.

translations.text: In the sixth NINE, undivided, we see one to whose increase none will contribute, while many will seek to assail him. He observes no regular rule in the ordering of his heart. There will be evil.
上九：莫益之，或擊之。立心勿恆，凶。

lines.normalized_meaning: At the top, if you hoard benefit for yourself and abandon steady principle, allies disappear and attackers gather. Selfish increase becomes downfall.
